channel.title: Blogs on Rahul Mishra
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Rahul Mishra

item.title: Analysing My First Malware
item.description: This blog goes through the main phases of malware analysis which includes: static analysis, behaviour analysis,emulation techniques and code analysis. brbbot Network Activities DNS Query (Frame 7) The source IP 192.168.44.129 sends a DNS query to 192.168.44.128 (likely a DNS server) asking for the IP address corresponding to the domain brb.3dtuts.by. Query ID: 0xf0a8 Purpose of Query ID (0xf0a8) Uniqueness: Each DNS query has a unique Query ID to differentiate it from other queries sent to the DNS server.
